description.narrative: - Improve access to finance as it will enable ACLEDA Lao to continue providing credit to micro and small borrowers, and SMEs. - Specific indicators will be used to monitor the development impact of the Project include growth in portfolio, growth in number of micro, small and SME borrowers, outreach indicators (branches).

The Project is to provide a senior loan to ACLEDA Bank Lao Ltd (ACLEDA Lao), an existing client of IFC. ACLEDA Lao was established in July 2008 in Lao PDR by Acleda Bank Plc. Cambodia (ACLEDA), also an existing IFC client. ACLEDA Lao provides financial services and products to micro and small borrowers, and SMEs. With an increasing focus on the SME sector in Lao PDR, ACLEDA Lao has grown its loan portfolio by a compound annual growth rate of over 200% between 2008 and 2011. Through this project, IFC aims to support ACLEDA Laos growth with an objective of increasing access to finance to micro and small borrowers, and SMEs. The proposed project consists of a senior loan of up to US$8 million with maturity of up to 5 years (grace period of up to 2 years).

mailing-address.narrative: Mr. Narin PHONManaging Director & CEOACLEDA Bank Lao Ltd., # 372, Conner of Dongpalane and Dongpaina Road,Unit 21, Phonesavanh Neua Village, Sisattanak District,Vientiane Capital, Lao PDR. P.O.Box:1555 Phone : (856-21) 260 567 / 264 994 / 264 998 (Ext. 301)Fax : (856-21) 264 995 E-Mail : mailto:narin@acledabank.com.la Website : http://www.acledabank.com.kh

name.narrative: ACLEDA Lao is headquartered in Vientiane Capital, Lao PDR. As of December 31, 2012 ACLEDA Lao extended services to 22,762 depositors and 12,571 borrowers through its 8 branches and 20 Service Units across Lao PDR. Investments can be made throughout the country.
